duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform average to difficult tasks relating to the provision of federal and state disaster assistance within the Cal OES Recovery Branch.
Work within various programs including grants management, public assistance, research analysis and documentation, and administration.
Function in a demanding and changing environment, maintain a routine workload, and regularly respond to short-term tasks.
Meet regulatory and internal deadlines on all assignments and may be required to travel on short notice.
Work in a Joint Field Office and work overtime as necessary in support of Cal OES program objectives.
Act with great independence while effectively maintaining a routine workload.
May be required to travel on short notice.
Work in a Joint Field Office and work overtime as necessary in support of Cal OES program objectives.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Emergency Management, Public Administration, or a related field.
